channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Directory Server 12.4 for RHEL 9
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Directory Server 12.4 for RHEL 9

item.title: CVE-2024-2199|2024-06-25T16:26:05.166Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20directory%20server%2012.4%20for%20rhel%209
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was found in 389-ds-base ldap server. This issue may allow an authenticated user to cause a server crash while modifying `userPassword` using malformed input.

item.title: CVE-2024-3657|2024-06-25T16:26:35.194Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20directory%20server%2012.4%20for%20rhel%209
item.description: A flaw was found in 389-ds-base. A specially-crafted LDAP query can potentially cause a failure on the directory server, leading to a denial of service
